website_summaries.verdict: Super sturdy, reasonably attractive, and large enough to serve as both bench and storage box.
pros: Double-wall construction holds up to weather, rain, and hard use
120-gallon capacity is great for pool toys, patio cushions, and garden supplies
cons: Some consumers point out that the assembled box had gaps that let in bugs and water

customer_reviews.title: What am I missing?
customer_reviews.text: The pieces fit together properly but there is nothing to hold them together; the pieces don't even lock in place. One bit of pressure and the entire thing topples like a deck of cards!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: some tapped out easily, others did not and caused slight damage from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the Rubbermaid brand.... I spent over a half hour trying to pop out plastic pieces ... some tapped out easily, others did not and caused slight damage from the screwdriver as it says to use. The large sides are "warped" from being in the box, so snapping together the pieces is not easy. Also, the warping leaves gaps at bottom corners for bugs to enter. I'm disappointed. 😞
customer_reviews.author: C Reefer

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: The overhang by our front door doesn't provide much protection for packages on rainy days, and we wanted to have a good-sized weather-resistant container that delivery people could leave packages in. The Rubbermaid Deck Box fits the bill nicely, and items inside of it stay dry as a bone even during heavy downpours. My only complaint, and it's a fairly minor one, is that moisture that's collected on the lid tends to run into the box if you don't brush it away with your hand before you open the lid. All in all, we're happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Milholland

customer_reviews.title: There are better boxes for the same price
customer_reviews.text: This deck box was okay at best. For the price there are definitely much better boxes out there. Went together fairly easy, the fit leaves a lot to be desired. This box will not keep out spiders and other bugs. It will most likely keep out direct rain however moisture will probably be an issue. I would not recommend this box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ViaVeritas

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately have to give this a bad review. I usually like everything by Runbermaid but we are so disappointed with how flimsy this is. Yes it's easy to put together, but the staying together is the tough part. Nothing and I mean NOTHING sticks together. Just falls apart. And because nothing clicks into place, water does get into it through the cracks that should be tightly secured but arent. We unfortunately can't return it otherwise we would. A complete waste of money! So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Assembled per instructions. The first night a stiff breeze made the box fall into pieces. Completely unusable. And the merchant expects me to repackage this huge item at my own expense and ship it back before they will issue a refund. How am I supposed to ship this ?? And no way to contact the merchant......
customer_reviews.author: LotusBodyProducts

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This storage unit was just what we needed. We can fit our spa supplies, eight towels, two spa pillows and we still have room for more. It rains a lot in Oregon and we have had no leakage problems at all. Great buy. We did have a few outside scratches and small dents (from delivery perhaps), but it hasn't affected the item's performance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Corr

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid 2047053 Deck Box Medium Sandstone review
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this for the packages that we have delivered. We live out in the county and have a fence up with a gate so it fits perfect on the inside of our gate and the mailman loves it because we have a long driveway and now he doesn't have to make the long haul any longer. It was easy to put together and everything stay nice and dry until we pick them up. We also have a camera on the gate so we can see when we get mail and packages. So everything has worked out great with this deck box. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not up to standard
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. It doesn't snap together. It fits together like a puzzle and if you open the lid too far it causes it to fall apart. There are no screws that hold it together. It was easy to put together but it would be better if it had something to hold it together. It's really too bad that it's so poorly made. It's definitely cheap and roomy but we will have to replace it with something else. It just won't last and it's so flimsy. Usually Rubbermaid makes good stuff. I wouldn't recommend it to anybody. Definitely not waterproof either.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof5

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I'm not understanding all the negative reviews - it took a couple of minutes to assemble, seems to fit together tightly, and it's definitely sturdy. You don't need to drill holes for the strap screws, sharp stainless steel screws >> plastic. 4 stars instead of 5 because (1) the included instruction sheet was more or less useless, and (2) having the first step be "knock out the tab holes" is just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Al BeBack

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these for outside around the side of the house; one for pool towels, one for pool items, one for toys! Keeps the towels dry (as long as the lid is closed correctly) and keeps everything organized out back. They’ve made such a difference in keeping my yard and patio organized. My kids are no longer toddlers so I don’t worry about the lid closing on them when they get their toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storing Grill accessories
customer_reviews.text: Very well made outdoor storage box. I am using this box to store grilling accessories for new kamado grill. So far I have a 35lbs bag of lump charcoal. A 20lbs bag of charcoal brickettes, two medium size bags of wood for smoking, and several other grilling accessories. Very sturdy, but assembly’s was difficult, took a bit with limited instructions and some force using a hammer and wrench. Overall very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tct2

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit together well
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing. This Rubbermaid deck box looks pretty good and was easy to put together but the pieces do not fit tightly. Consequently there are gaps of 1/4 inches or more which allow rain into the box. How can a iconic company like Rubbermaid sell a product that is so poorly constructed? This is the second item I have recently purchased from Rubbermaid that is so poorly constructed / designed that it is nearly useless. How sad for Rubbermaid - what are they thinking? After these experiences I won't be buying anymore of their products. I have attached a picture of a seam where the gap is so large you can see into the box.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not intuitive- try flipping the bottom piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deck box. For its simplicity though, it's very difficult to assemble. Mine was not fitting correctly at all. Finally I had a handyman come over who was helping me with other items, and he was able to re-assemble it and told me the issue was the bottom piece that sits on the floor had been upside down. This was not intuitive at all. It fits better now, so if you're having problems with it perhaps flip that piece upside down and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: Like most Rubbermaid products
customer_reviews.text: Like most Rubbermaid products, this one is designed to be sturdy and functional. I would have given it 5 stars, except that the instructions weren't as clear as they needed to be. Attaching the top was a bit of a problem. Likewise attaching the straps that keep the top from opening too far. Rubbermaid needs to fire the person who insisted that the instructions rely almost solely on pictures, some of which were too small to be clear--and who also insisted that the instructions fit on one sheet of 8 1/2" x 11" piece of paper. Spend another penny, folks, and make the instructions clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Niell Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid outside storage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to put 4 outside folding camping chairs in on our patio. Good size & big enough for what we are storing. I'll be interested to see how long this will last. Put out in Dec or Feb. 2020. Will be stored in garage when we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: Not insect proof
customer_reviews.text: Instructions have pics but only one line of text. Do able if you have some ability. It looks to be rodent proof but there are a lot of corners that don’t fit up very well so you can expect insects inside. There are not any handles on, my fault I guess as I didn’t notice, so put it where you want it before you put anything inside. Unless you have a lock with a with a 2” throat, you will have to cut away some of the lip to put a lock on.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good for packages, pool toys or pillows.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces snapped together well but the top did not snap in securely to the base (bought used so the tabs were already popped). Will end up putting screws or hinges in there. Tough to get pegs holding top through, awkward. Using it on porch for Amazon deliveries. Big, would be good to store pool toys or outdoor furniture pillows too.
customer_reviews.author: DenverMom46

customer_reviews.title: How weather resistant?
customer_reviews.text: Most of it's easy to put together with the diagram. Inserting the hinges to secure the top requires a bit of maneuvering. It says something like "weather resistant. And the seams are not so tight that I expect it to keep everything inside dry. I also expect that with some use the screws that attach the top to the body to prevent excessive opening will tear out of the plastic. I wouldn't recommend this for keeping anything really dry, especially in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: NOT A FAN
customer_reviews.text: If you decide to buy this, I hope you have a better experience than I did. Tabs do not not line up accurately. (yes I was doing it correctly), so they will break off. Now you have to grab some glue to try to put these parts together. I am disappointed in Rubbermaid. I am a musician, so I know how to use duct tape. I hope one roll will do it. Wish me luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were vague. Had to figure out the bottom needed to be flipped to snap in the sides. Holds what I needed and like the raised bottom will protect my things when hosing down the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Carla in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part & Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Item was missing straps and instructions. Rubbermaid....if you're listening, send straps & instructions! UPDATE, Amazon turned me over to Rubbermaid, who put me on hold. In the meantime, I got the instruction via the web, but what a piece of junk. Put together, don't try and move it, it completely falls apart like a house of cards. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The hinges
customer_reviews.text: Assembling the bottom and the sides was a breeze. Adding the lid, however, was a struggle. It took me almost half an hour to finally hammer the pins in place. And the instructions were not clear at all about how to attach the braces. Perhaps some better technical writing and drawings would improve the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: annejv

customer_reviews.title: No Strap Included as ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: The storage unit box should have come with a strap so it would not flip back all the way. There was none included. I realized that the hinge would break if I let it go all the way back. So I had no choice but to lean against the house! Not happy! I HOPE AMAZON WILL MAKE CERTAIN ONE IS SENT TO ME!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Waited several weeks for delivery due to some "unknown delay", and wishing now that I had just returned it upon delivery because it is NOT the quality I had come to expect from Rubbermaid. Assembly was nothing short of frustrating as screw holes were not predrilled, product materials were cheap (at best), written instructions were basically useless and mainly written in Spanish, and to add to the frustration it is hardly waterproof with open seams. It certainly was not worth my time, money or aggravation. Do yourself a favor and research these deck boxes because there has got to be better quality products than this out there. 😣
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: They sent wrong color, hard to put together, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: They sent me the wrong color. But I don’t want to waste my time and resources sending the giant box back. Seems like an okay storage bin. I couldn’t put it together alone, the final step of hamming the hinges was hard. It shouldn’t be this expensive but it will work for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Light plastic. No its not weather proof.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what you might think. Its cheaply made and not weather proof. the seams on the joinign edges do not seal out water at all. As far as putting it together. The lid was the hardest part when you try to install the hinges. That is not easy and i bent the plastic bolts used to try to.
customer_reviews.author: swbrown69

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was the exact size I needed and is a great product. I have 3 of these in my back yard for various products I want to be out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: I. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful and precise
customer_reviews.text: Punch out holes for fitting pieces together would snap out easily with something straight like a screwdriver, and a hammer. If you’re careless with removing the punch outs, the perimeter will crack/break. Not good for fitting parts together. So be careful
customer_reviews.author: blossom Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile all-weather storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my patio. Five. It’s size, it has quite a bit of storage. It also has a built-in hole to lock the lid if desired. It not only serves as a storage box, but also seating for up to 2 and a table top. Love the Rubbermaid storage products!
customer_reviews.author: chinnman

customer_reviews.title: Works well, pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick, assembly is kind of pain in the butt, sturdy, needs to be on a flat surface for sure, works well so far
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: The assemble quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying the product is great, study, and easy to assemble. I used my pocket knife to remove the tabs which took all of 10 minutes. Shipping on the other hand was terrible . The packing box was torn and held together with shipping tape . Opening the box which amounted to cutting the tape the box fell apart. The floor unit was dented, I have a rubber hammer and was able to remove the dent. The rest of the assembly went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Sandstone, got brown instead. Too much ha$$le to return. The box arrived damaged and partially open. The lid and sides of the deck box had dents and scratches. As others have mentioned, the sides do not meet and there is a quarter inch gap where the front meets the side due to warping from shipment. Rain will definitely come inside the box through this gap. Instructions were not too hard to follow and assembly went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M Downey

customer_reviews.title: Not durable over time
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even make it 4 years outside, it was partially covered but slowly started falling apart at the back seam and wouldn't ever stay tighly closed even when we tried putting it back together. All our stuff was water damaged. Critters love it as a cool home, so that's fun too :(
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Immovable.
customer_reviews.text: Once they are assembled they cannot be moved without falling apart. The tabs for each piece slide into slots but do not lock!! So disappointed in their Rubber Maid product. I would have returned them had it not been such a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bin.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit wobbly. We filled the internal cracks with caulk to keep the bugs out but I think it melted in the heat of summer. You have to keep it a few inches away from any wall behind it to open properly. Other than that, it’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Aura Mael

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Needed some outdoor storage and extra seat. This was easy to assemble, and holds a set of six cushions plus a couple accent pillows. However, the top just barely aligns with the bottom, so the closure doesn't stay secure. It doesn't have a latch, but it does have two circular holes that are supposed to line up and kind of latch into each other (you could put a padlock through the hole to secure). They don't stay together. Other than that, it does what we bought it for. Seems to be weathering okay so far. We'll see how it stands up to the heat of an Arizona summer.
customer_reviews.author: kelkat

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Was bigger and better than I thought. Assembled in 10 minutes. Holds lots of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: pattypink

customer_reviews.title: Awful, cheap and unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. The entire box is held together by sides with pins sliding into the two other, heavier sides with holes. All four sides DO NOT attach securely to the base. This means that if you lift up the box from the sides, the bottom falls out. This makes the lock option useless and the seat option, unsafe. The positive reviews seem very suspicious in light of the undamaged product I received. Read the other negative comments to see that this is not an isolated case.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not weatherproof and falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep our hot tub supplies and cornhole in. It is not weatherproof come to find out. I went to gran the cornhole bags to lend to a friend and they were soaked. Also it falls apart when you open it. We still use it for the hot tub siloed, but it really is a pain to get stuff in and out of due to it falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Hansley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and clean storage
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy assembly. It is exactly as described. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described. We needed it to store our new pool cleaner in. The cleaner fits in it with room easily. The good thing is we are able to lock it. Would recommend this for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s going right to the landfill.
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. Looks cheap. If this is going to be anywhere visible, if you need it to last, or if you need to keep stored items dry, spend a little more and pass on this. Products like this shouldn’t even be made.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.text: It fit just perfect in the spot we had for it. All our cushions fit in it and locks down so far no water or moisture in it. Quality seems very sturdy. Had a gathering and a couple of people sat on it. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid 5F21 Deck Box with Seat
customer_reviews.text: Outside in my backyard, it stood well next to my Rubbermaid Vertical Storage Shed (77 by 56 by 32 inches) which I had for over 15 years. Spacious interior, useful for storing my earthquake survival supplies and other heavy duty power tools, etc. Though the package came without an instruction, it was very easy to assemble (note to prosepective buyers, make sure you punch out bottom base slots so that all 4 walls could snap into and disregard complained customers' reviews, which didn't do their homework). I highly recommend it. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Post

customer_reviews.title: Keep everything dry outside
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep the bedding for the chicken coop dry. This fit the bill. I keep it outside next to the chicken coop everything is dry no matter how hard it rains.
customer_reviews.author: John3v36

customer_reviews.title: Not a seat for your patio!
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful product, very sturdy and durable. However, it is advertised as a storage box, as well as a "seat" for your patio or deck. If this product material is exposed to high temperatures, let's say over 85 degrees, the lid becomes more soft and pliable. I would not put my weight on it for any duration of time, you will damage it, along with the hinges. maybe for a child weighing 60 lbs or less, but for an adult, I would not recommend sitting on it at all.
customer_reviews.author: The savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: This was difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Having to pry on and pop out the connectors with a flathead screwdriver was annoying and made the assembly process challenging. The pieces did not it together perfectly but there have been no issues with leakage.
customer_reviews.author: doxiegrl

customer_reviews.title: Good All-Weather Storage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it when it was on sale. Therefore I am pretty happy with it. Assembling was easy, and storage items are well protected. The cut-out for attaching a lock proved to be very useful - not that much for anti-theft purposes but for keeping the lid closed during severe high wind storms. What I like to mention is the seating should rarely be used and is not for heavier people. Despite weighing just 130 lbs., the profile of the lid's reinforcement frame started to become apparent after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Not weather proof
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong color deck box. The box did snap together easily. However, there are gaps between the panels which let water and insects in easily. I did not send the item back as the company only had a few of the ones I wanted (3) left at the time I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but still looked like crap. We found this box and suddenly our ...
customer_reviews.text: my kid had toys everywhere in the back yard. We would throw them into a pile, but still looked like crap. We found this box and suddenly our yard looks like an actual yard again. Seems sturdy, but not sure if I would sit on it. Maybe kids can sit, but im not sure about grown adults. My wife is 5 foot and 1/16th of an inch and weighs about 100 pounds. She may be able to sit on it but me, 5'9 sculpted 210LBS... not sure and dont want to test it
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Opinion: Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. No instructions and about broke my finger trying to snap together....and figure out top from bottom.. these came in 6 large pieces There is no way this thing is going to keep water out. I'm returning asap. Plus, a gust of wind will have these thing back in 6 pieces . Ugh . So dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Newby

customer_reviews.title: But honestly its pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was initially hesitant to purchase because of the mentioned "build" quality. But honestly its pretty good!!! Snaps together easily and seems sturdy enough for what...$60! Yes its not THE BEST but for the $60, its pretty darn good. Very spacious, fits my kid's stroller and random items all in one unit. It IS NOT Weather sealed, but seems to withstand light rains. My only beef is why don't they just Pre- Punch out the tabs on the bottom? Well if you in need of storage, this is good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GANBATEKUDASAI

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: There were missing screws and parts don’t fit together exactly. We had to really work with the box to get it all out together. Not an easy just put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nicely designed and weather-resistant storage place for your deck
customer_reviews.text: We've moved into a new home a few years back, with a deck instead of a covered porch. This presented a problem, since all of the things we normally left out were now drenched when we went out after a rainstorm. This unit allows me to keep things like gardening tools, leaf blower, power cord, gardening gloves and clogs dry during downpours, but easily accessible when we're going to use them. I even keep the grill flashlight in there, for those late afternoon winter grilling sessions. No leaks, easy assembly, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit, large capacity
customer_reviews.text: i store power tools outdoors in this unit -- it was difficult to install the lid due to very tight tolerances for hinges, but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tomarys

customer_reviews.title: Strange design
customer_reviews.text: To begin, this thing is HUGE. (The measurements provided don't provide a good "picture" of how big it is). The assembly is straightforward but strange (It kind of "snaps" together). I haven't had any problems with the thing falling apart, but it seems like it could at any second. I move it around on my patio with things inside and it stays together. If you need some extra storage space for outdoor items, you really won't go wrong with this for the price. The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the way the unit is assembled.
customer_reviews.author: RDSWY4

customer_reviews.title: Box comes apart
customer_reviews.text: I have used the box all summer. The deck box fits together very loosely and tends to disassemble itself with very little cause. Just a small strain at the wrong place - like a 10 pound (4.5 kg) bag of charcoal falling against an interior wall - will cause the box to come apart at the seams. Duct tape helps but I think the box is only suited to storing patio furniture cushions, but the box will not keep water out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-1943

customer_reviews.title: This is great! We keep bird seed in it and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! We keep bird seed in it and it's perfect. It's not a bad seat in a pinch either. It was a little tricky to put together (the hinges), but take your time, start from the outside, and finish on the inside. Recommended without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: cmebloom

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges from manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: This was right along the lines of what I expected quality wise. Product arrived in a partially crushed box, and required a brace inside on a warm day to reform into the correct shape for proper closure, due to shipping damage. Sharp partially unfinished edges from manufacturing. Took a few minutes with a knife to trim these to smoothed edges. 1 person assembly, except for attaching the lid via the hinges. (I did it myself but recommend having someone help.) Much larger than I expected. (I should have measured out the size listed in the product description)
customer_reviews.author: J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to the weatherproofness of this item as I have not had it long enough. It assembled very easily, it is what I expected but it Arrived a little bit damaged. The shipping Box was damaged in 2 or 3 places and there Is a Dent on both sides of the item. This does not affect its use in any way nor It's usefulness. I will keep this item and not go through the hassle of returning and waiting for a new one as I need it Now.
customer_reviews.author: ann m hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Hide the junk pop this trunk together.
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to like. Went together like leggo's. Fits on the porch. Hides all my odds and ends from yard tools to pots. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and it's well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and it's well made. I like that you can sit on it because my kids would have even if it wasn't meant for that (that's what broke the last one). It has a spot for a padlock which is nice (not necessary for us). Nice color and seems very sturdy and has kept the toys dry we placed in there.
customer_reviews.author: AccrualCat

customer_reviews.title: came with broken anchor inside box
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy item on a big box and this is the reason why I did not returned it to Amazon. One of the anchors was broken inside the box. I had to drill holes around the area and use metal wire to attach the parts. The box is not difficult to put together other than the top cover for which you might need a second person to level it properly and a piece of wood to hammer on. Whatever you put inside, should not make pressure on the walls or the would easily come off.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A. Peña

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't put it together a piece was broken upon arrival and amazon call center is not taking phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of these, ordered in 2015, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these, ordered in 2015, 2013, and 2011. Perhaps I stuff them too full of cushions, but I have had to add metal straps at the corners of all 3 to keep the top from spreading with time. The only thing that holds the sides and front together at the top is a single plastic spike going into a hole, and it is not strong enough to hold the sides/front together with time.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deck box
customer_reviews.text: This deck box is excellent. It was a little larger than I expected but that works well for me. It's hard to get a visual when ordering online. It was easy to put together, my 4 year old helped and we had it finished in 30 minutes. Items inside stay dry which is a plus. I expected some rain would get through but so far every thing has stayed completely dry, even when I run the sprinklers. The extra seat is great too for when company comes over and we want to sit outside. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a good, yet inexpensive, storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: As described,
customer_reviews.text: It keeps garden supplies dry and enclosed, which was the whole point of buying it. Easy to assemble. I have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriy Tolkov

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth my money. I did secure it stationary as too many kids want to "have it" LOL. Beside my front door and seems to be a good height for a seat and has the lockable storage combo. I leave an opened pad lock on it for deliveries if I am out, and the delivery guys know to put packages inside and snap the pad lock closed. Bad guys following delivery guys around, and dashing to someones` porch and snatching packages seem to be becoming prevalent. They can`t get my packages noew. I have had a few stolen off my porch in the past. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck Storage!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid deck box perfect for all our pool paraphernalia & toys. Well-made & easy to assemble! As described & arrived on schedule!
customer_reviews.author: Sharynlj

customer_reviews.title: Great Outside Storage Container
customer_reviews.text: Love this container. After getting a hint from another review, it was easy to put together. Very sturdy and perfect size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and is solid. Use it for pool stuff. Very happy with purchase. Wind of 50mph ripped the lid off. Plastic hinge stops.
customer_reviews.author: fafhrd

customer_reviews.title: What an awful product!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't be bothered to write reviews and never do, but this item was so bad, I felt compelled to warn would be buyers about it. Don't buy this POS - it comes with no instructions, the pieces fit together poorly, and the hinges holding the cover are weak and flimsy. How this item has 4.5 stars is beyond me. Ignore all other reviews - this is the one that counts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Motyl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pot together
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and very east to put together. My cat could do it. Pretty sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Sending back ASAP
customer_reviews.text: obviously this is a defective item that was resold to me. AND IT STILL DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- limited storage
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, Just wish it had more storage. the dimensions described are correct but actual storage space is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this at all
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was supposed to be an outside box! I don't see how - when you are putting this thing together, it takes 3 people because 2 of them have to hold all the pieces together as you are trying to "click" them in!!! Even once all are clicked in - this box is still not even close to being ready for outside use - it comes apart if you even touch it and it is not secure at any one point. Do not recommend this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my patio
customer_reviews.text: My deck storage is waterproof and holds a lot. I have a few of bags of potting soil and lots of garden tools stored in it. It seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sue

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a tighter fit.
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are hit or miss when it comes to the fit of the pieces. Mine was pretty sloppy and required 14z of silicon caulk to make it reasonably water tight. The lid doesn't align well with the box so I used a zip tie to secure the lid for the winter. There is a lot of slop in the manufacturing tolerances for this product. But, I made it work. I have several other Rubbermaid sheds that fit together tighter but I still caulked them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works & Keeps Water Out
customer_reviews.text: It worked for what I wanted - needed to cover a crawl space that collects water & block the already screened entry from destructive kittens & raccoons. I was never able to get the lid attached - not enough brute force to get the pins through the holes. However, the lid stayed on sitting under the eves with rain pouring heavily on it all winter & some pretty strong winds. Was considering using twisty ties to attach the lid to the body, but didn't need to after all.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: Not something I'd recommend to protect things of value
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, not water resistant whatsoever. It has a spot for a combination lock in the front, however, if someone were to just give it a swift kick, I'm sure the whole thing would fall apart. Not something I'd recommend to protect things of value.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my deck. Needed something to hold the grill cover, tools and some other stuff that was starting to clutter the deck. Assembled quick and easy. I already used it as a step stool, the thing is super sturdy. Per other reviews I read, I am going to run a bead of caulk/silicone on the inside edges to make it truly watertight. Best part? Amazon was $20 less than the local home improvement chain and they shipped it free too!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly IF you pay attention to the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Good price for lots of storage. Easy to put together. I read all the reviews which had information on putting it together and paid close attention to the pictures on the instructions. The biggest thing is to start with the bottom piece with the Rubbermaid name down.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable outside storage
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together! The plastic is strong and seems to be water tight so far. It was out in the rain all last weekend while raining and the inside is dry and never saw water. If you live where you may get a lot of rain though I would keep it elevated as I'm sure any submersion in water would leak in. It is well strong enough to use as a bench as well, which is great since it creates less waste of useful space in my small backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Loken

customer_reviews.title: Decent, doubt it's water tight if left on a marina/dock
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very easy to assemble Sturdy design eith plenty of space (i purchased the 10 cu ft model) Overall very light Cons: The seams do not line up perfectly between the walls, so there a tiny gaps. I cant see this being water proof so im keeping under a covered porch. I dont like the hinge design as i couldnt knock the plastic hinges thru easily. I might end up replacing with a galvanized bolt and washer.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to put together but I was not sure where ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together but I was not sure where the straps were to be connected. Had help with that.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool area
customer_reviews.text: Went together very easily. Chlorine, robot vacuum and some pool toys fit in there. Also, very sturdy and can be sat on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the pool stuff plus more! Great outside storage
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: YAY - a deck storage that doesn't leak!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased w/this item. Watertight so far (after 2 storms) and easy to put together - the instructions were pretty good but thanks also to Keith G's review from 2016 which was helpful. Am buying a 2nd one to replace another deck box (not a Rubbermaid product) which leaks terribly due to bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, have not seen leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This sits in my backyard, I have not noticed any water leaking inside. Also holds us sitting on it. Two people at about 130 lbs each. I don't know how it would hold for more weight than that. So far, so good, sturdy and we can hid a lot of the backyard miscellaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Small but dependable
customer_reviews.text: Have a rental property and needed the storage. No hardware needed except screws to attach hinge straps. Large enough but not too obstructive.
customer_reviews.author: vanhalen4vr

customer_reviews.title: that's fine, but the instructions don't indicate that to be ...
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived partially open and misshapen. The sides and the front and back panel don't fit flush together, you can see the gap. I can't tell if the product is damaged or if it is just cheaply made. Also, there are no holes pre-drilled in the lid for the straps. If that's how it is supposed to be made, that's fine, but the instructions don't indicate that to be the case. There is very little clearance between the part where the hole in the lid should be, so it's tricky to make. Not worth $80, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Not Anybodys Mother

customer_reviews.title: It survived the shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered crushed in spots and ripped at corners. It was re-wrapped in plastic to hold it together. The product itself survived but apparently the screws needed were not in the box. Didn't realize it until the end and had to use mismatched screws to attach the straps so the top wouldn't fall off. Other than that, it serves it's purpose to store items on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: lhenry

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart a lot
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say this but it’s truly awful. It’s so rickety and just pops apart constantly. It’s like just laying a few pieces of plastic together. There’s no sturdiness or strong structure to it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Holland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, strong as hell.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is simply amazing. It basically all snaps together and you have this great little weatherproof storage box. Putting it together couldn't be more easy. And as an added bonus it also makes a really great seat! Don't pay any attention to the people talking about it falling apart. They've put it together wrong. In most cases, if you're having this problem just flip the base over and you'll be fine. If you follow the directions it really is strong and is not going to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Buddhagem

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy box!
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA and tough as hell. I actually bought a different brand at Lowe's, put it together and took it back because it was cheap junk. I put a 5 gallon propane tank, 5 gallon gas tank, 1 gallon gas tank and a 1 burner fish fryer in it with more room for small stuff available. I weigh 190 pounds and sat on the lid with no problem or give. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike V.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the deck needed
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this box. Those that said it was difficult to put together are all wet and clearly did not read the instruction or look at the picture. If you do either it is pretty obvious what to do. Speaking of being all wet, the main reason I bought this was to store chair cushions out on the deck and keep them dry. It is great for this and everything inside is kept bone dry. Sturdy built, easy to assemble, keeps things dry and has much more room then I thought. What is not to love?
customer_reviews.author: R. J. P

customer_reviews.title: Look great on our deck
customer_reviews.text: Look great on our deck. 10 stars! We are using ours for the extra propane tank back up. It will fit 2 cans easily and more stuff! Great price and is also comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird Ranch Vacation House Rental

customer_reviews.title: Everything stayed dry!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last year to store pool toys and charcoal. I read other reviews and was careful to put it together correctly. It has stayed out on the pool deck in all the elements all Fall, Spring, and Summer. I recently pulled out the opened bag of charcoal that was in it from our last cook out (last Oct). The charcoal was bone dry. The pool toys also re-inflated and worked fine. Everything inside the box was completely dry and it did not appear that any water got inside the box. No sign that critters had gotten either. Planning to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: SailorGirl

customer_reviews.title: Assembled product is not solid!
customer_reviews.text: This storage container is of very poor design! The hinges are flimsy, the parts are not solidly connected. Overall, we’re very disappointed. Especially for a Rubbermaid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid 2047053 Deck Box Medium Sandstone
product_meta.description: Color:Sandstone| Size:MediumThe Rubbermaid Deck Box with Seat offers seating or serving space combined with storage. Featuring a Sandstone colored lid and floor and olive steel colored panels. New hinge design for improved accessibility and durability. This Rubbermaid deck box is lockable (lock not included). Rubbermaid deck boxes are maintenance-free and crack-resistant in cold temperatures.
feature_bullets: Outdoor storage and seating in one durable combination
Comfortable seating for 2 adults, with easy assembly
Great for storing patio accessories, grilling, and small lawn supplies
Weather resistant material that will not rot or rust like metal or wood furniture
42 inches long by 24 inches wide by 24 inches high; 75 gallons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars775 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
